text: William James Myers (April 16, 1937 - February 17, 2017), better known by his ring name George "The Animal" Steele, was a former American professional wrestler and actor. Steele's career lasted from 1967 until 1989. He also played Swedish wrestler/actor Tor Johnson in Ed Wood. George Steele, who was a Baptist, died on February 17, 2017 under hospice care in Cocoa Beach, Florida from kidney failure, aged 79.WWE Hall Of Famer George 'The Animal' Steele Passes Away At 79 ==References== ==Other websites== * * *WWE Hall of Fame profile *Interview with Steele about his career (from Legends of Wrestling 2) *May 19, 2011 Interview with George "The Animal" Steele (on Roundtable Wrestling Radio) Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Detroit Category:American Baptists Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida Category:Former WWE wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Detroit Category:WWE Hall of Fame Category:People with dyslexia Category:People with Crohn's disease
title: George Steele
